title: Example: Policy Evaluation

definitions.Policy Evaluation: The process of assessing the effectiveness of a policy or strategy.

formulas: Q(s) = \sum_{s' \in S} P(s' | s) \cdot R(s, s')
summary: The slide presents a visual example of policy evaluation in AI, contrasting two strategies: 'Always Go Right' and 'Always Go Forward'. It includes a formula for calculating the value of a state in policy evaluation.
